parameters.name: Collection
parameters.description:
The name of the collection.

> You can call the [ListCollections](~~2401503~~) operation to query a list of collections.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The cluster ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs.

parameters.name: IndexName
parameters.description: The name of the Elasticsearch index.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description:
The namespace name.

> You can call the [ListNamespaces](~~2401502~~) operation to query a list of namespaces.

parameters.name: NamespacePassword
parameters.description:
The password of the namespace.

> The value of this parameter is specified when you call the [CreateNamespace](~~2401495~~) operation.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the cluster.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) operation to query the available region list.

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the workspace that consists of multiple AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances. This parameter and DBInstanceId cannot both be empty. If both parameters are specified, this value takes precedence.

Valid values:

*   ip
*   l2
*   cosine
